tool_description: Generate an ASCII art of cow or other animals / characters saying things from a given word or text.
name: Cowsay
title: Cowsay

api_list.name: Get cow styles
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cowsay.p.rapidapi.com/cowsay/list_styles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cowsay.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cowsay.p.rapidapi.com/cowsay/list_styles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cowsay.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
